This interactive p5.js project brings a lively spring scene to life with animated bees, falling petals, fractal cherry trees, spiral flowers, drifting clouds, and a moving sun. Combining generative patterns and nature-inspired elements, it creates a whimsical garden that evolves continuously with time.
